com.aftershipsdk100.api.api

Class ApiDataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aftershipsdk100.api.api.ApiDataManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpRequestDelegate

    public class ApiDataManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements HttpRequestDelegate
    Manages all the http request (GET or POST) that are sent to the server Also manages the JSON responses received and parses into customized object accordingly, depending on the type of request

      • createTracking

        public void createTracking(java.lang.String slug,
                  java.lang.String trackingNo,
                  java.lang.String title,
                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> smses,
                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> emails,
                  java.lang.String orderId,
                  java.lang.String orderIdPath,
                  CustomFields customFields,
                  ApiRequestDelegate requestDelegate,
                  java.lang.String API_KEY)
        Sends an HTTP POST request in order to create a tracking
        Parameters:
        slug - Unique code of courier
        trackingNo - Tracking number of a shipment
        title - Title of the tracking
        smses - Phone number(s) to receive sms notifications
        emails - Email address(es) to receive email notifications
        orderId - Text field for order ID
        orderIdPath - Text field for order ID path
        customFields - Custom fields that accept any text string
        requestDelegate - interface reference
